subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Lewis coached the Cougars for 30 years, and to five Final Fours, but he is best remembered for his squads of the 1980s and their thunderous style of play.
snippet: Lewis coached the Cougars for 30 years, and to five Final Fours, but he is best remembered for his squads of the 1980s and their thunderous style of play.
